text: Great local Bar with the BEST Karaoke in the westend...food is amazing and the service great...especially from Noelle.   Great mix of all types of people...You wont be disapointed.
Decent pub.. So expensive in this city, 8 bucks a pint. Interior, decor looks 15, 20 years old. Popular for billiards.

Always have a great time here, never a dull moment! Wish the drinks weren't so expensive but the food is good. Pool is fun with friends too! Tables are in excellent shape and the cues are straight.  Atmosphere 7 Cleanliness 9 Food 6.5 Drinks 7.5 (always cold)
